params_summary: goal: Add a Norang-style orgmode workflow for Neovim with custom agenda views, punch in/out continuous clocking, and supporting docs/PR body.
addDecision: Risk level set to Low for orgmode workflow changes.
addDecision: Implement punch in/out via explicit Lua wrapper commands instead of hook-based clock-out automation.
addDecision: Expose default Organization task ID via vim.g.org_organization_task_id.
addDecision: Keep a single canonical usage doc at docs/orgmode-norang-workflow.md.
